attributes.action: Give NHS Staff free parking at work after the Coronavirus pandemic is over.
attributes.additional_details: Working long hours and unusual shifts and having to park distances away to save money. To be able to finish a shift and be able to take a short walk to their cars would help them immensely. To not have to pay a percentage of their wages towards parking would make a huge difference. This should have been the case before the Coronavirus Pandemic but even more so now.
attributes.background: Create free parking spaces for NHS Staff while they are on duty
